name: Planet: One More Year
description:
Your mission is to maintain the planets health.
You can spend in-game currency to do environmental activities across different continents. Each continent has its continent card which shows that continents resources and habitability.
To access a continent card click on one of the cities on map.

To buy resources click on corresponding resource icon in continent card.

Try to keep Oil, Temperature, Pollution and Waste down, and Water, Animals and Nature up.

Sometimes random effect cards pop-up. These can be beneficial or harmful.

Game ends when overall habitability goes down. Try to survive longest!

Team:
Miska Härkönen - Development

Minka Tornivuori - Art

Pauli Pekkarinen - Audio

Planet: One More Year was developed for Ludum Dare 50 game jam in under 72 hours.
